Entries.default:
"Puny. Too puny to join my crew."

Arms crossed, the hulking ogre looks you from head to toe. He spits at your feet, unimpressed.
"As I said, I seek bodies for a crew. And, no, you cannot join."

"Your persistence is impressive. And annoying. You cannot join my crew."

The ogre waves a meaty hand at you, dismissively.
"It is kind of you to announce yourself to me, bounty hunter. It will be just as kind of you to die by my hand."
